issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
I get the warning: Titanium.UI.iPhone.ActivityIndicatorStyle.PLAIN DEPRECATED in 5.1.0, in favor of Ti.UI.ActivityIndicatorStyle.PLAIN.

But using Ti.UI.ActivityIndicatorStylePLAIN instead of Ti.UI.iPhone.ActivityIndicatorStyle.DARK causes crash

TypeError: undefined is not an object (evaluating 'Ti.UI.ActivityIndicatorStyle.PLAIN')

comments.body: Hello, i have tested this issue in SDK 5.1.0.v20151023172822. I have got the warning when i use "Titanium.UI.iPhone.ActivityIndicatorStyle.PLAIN". Now using  "Ti.UI.ActivityIndicatorStyle.PLAIN" for iOS seems to work fine. The app didn't crash. I am using the sample code in the documentation link [here|http://docs.appcelerator.com/platform/latest/#!/api/Titanium.UI.ActivityIndicator]. Thanks.

Don't know why, but in the newest 5.2.x it works without crashing. 
Issue can be closed. Thanks
